title: [Emerald Street, River's Edge]
description: The street widens sharply to the east in a delta of smoother stone, giving way at its end to a lawn of low-cut green grass.  Several dwarven warriors rest on the turf, leaning lazily against the taut canvas side of a tent.

The street widens sharply to the east in a delta of smoother stone, giving way at its end to a lawn of low-cut green grass.  Several dwarven warriors rest on the turf, leaning lazily against the taut canvas side of a red and white tent.
